84338.「よっこらせ～の せっせっせッス！\n ふう～。今日も風が キモチいーッス！:
One, two, one, two, one, two!
Whew... what a strong wind today!

84340.「これから向かう 紅玉館には\n マクフォール家という ご一家が \n ふたりの:
We're headed to the Ruby Mansion, where the
McFaul family lives with their two servants.

84341.「もともと レンダーシアで リンゴ園を築き \n 財を成したご当主さまが 島をま:
The whole island was bought by an apple
orchard owner who made a fortune, and they
built their own house there.

84342.「…………やめておくッス。\n あんまり余計なことを ペラペラしゃべると\n ジ:
...Oops, I better not. Jade'll punish me if I
talk too much nonsense.

84343.「っと そんなことを話してたら \n お屋敷が 見えてきたッス。\n あれが 紅:
What do you know, as soon as I mention the
mansion... that's it over there!!

84344.「ようこそ 紅玉館へ。\n <pc>さまでございますね？\n 話は レイお嬢さま:
Welcome to the Ruby Mansion. And you are
<pc>, I presume? Miss Rei told
me all about you.

84345.「私は この紅玉館の使用人をしております\n ジェイドと申します。なにか ご用の:
My name is Jade, and I am but a servant here
at the Ruby Mansion. If there's anything you
need, I am at your service.

84346.「レイさまは ただ今 体調がすぐれないため\n 迎えに出ることが できないのです:
Miss Rei is not feeling well, so she cannot
greet you here. However, she is waiting for
you in her room on the second floor.

84347.「まずは レイさまに会って\n くわしい話を お聞きください。:
Please meet with Miss Rei for a more detailed
explanation of the situation.

84348.「レイさまのお部屋は このホールにあります\n 左右の階段をのぼって ２階にあが:
Miss Rei's room is in this hall up either set
of stairs to the second floor, in the
northeast section of the house.

84349.「館内は 自由に歩いてもらってかまいませんが\n どうか 西側奥の階段から\n:
You are free to go as you please, but please
refrain from going to the basement from the
back stairs on the west side of the house...

84350.「旦那さまのお部屋は レイさまのお部屋と\n ちょうど 反対の位置にございます。:
...as well as the Master's room, which is
opposite of Miss Rei's room. Please be mindful
of this.

84351.「本日 お集まりの皆さま。\n たいへん お待たせいたしました。これより\n 当:
To all of you gathered here today, thank you
very much for your patience. The family head,
Master Osmond, will now arrive.

84352.「……父のオズモンドです。\n おどろかせてしまいましたよね。\n ご紹介が遅く:
...that's my father, Osmond. I apologize for
the surprise. I'm sorry it took so long to
introduce you.

84353.「父は 気難しいところがあり……\n ある時 素顔を隠すようになってから\n 私:
My father is a difficult man. One day, he just
started hiding his face and dressing like
that, even in front of us.

84354.「お父さま。この度 デゼルの捜索に\n 協力してくださることになった\n <pc:
Father, this is <pc>. They've
agreed to help us look for Dezel.

84355.「旦那さまからの言葉を お伝えいたします。:
I'd like to share with you the words of the
Master.

84356.「本日は 遠路はるばる 紅玉館へようこそ。\n 末息子の捜索に ご協力いただき感:
You've all come a long way to visit the Ruby
Mansion today. Thank you for helping in the
search for my lost son.

84357.「それにしても デゼルのやつは いったい \n どこで 何をしているのだろうな。:
But where the hell did Dezel run off to? What
kind of person does such a thing to cause
everyone to worry so much?!

84358.「何か 事件になど巻き込まれていないと\n よいのですが……。\n 私 それが:
I just hope he's not involved in some sort of
crime... That's what worries me...

84359.「デゼルくんか……。 \n １ヶ月ほど前に 姿を消したと聞いたが\n 私も 心配:
Dezel... I heard he disappeared about a month
ago, so I got worried.

84360.「なーに 年頃のこぞうなんて ふらっと \n どこか遠くへ 行きたくなったりする:
You know, that's pretty normal for a boy his
age. Wanders off to go somewhere far and
then comes back home.

84361.「でも 叔父さま……。\n それならば 便りの一通くらいあっても\n よいと思う:
But, uncle... if that were true, couldn't he
at least send a letter...?

84362.「<pc>さんは 有能な冒険者だと聞く。\n きっと デゼルの行方の手がかりも\:
<pc> is a capable adventurer.
I'm sure he'll find some clue as to Dezel's
whereabouts.

84363.「はっはっは！ なんだか 空気が \n 重くなってしまったなあ。\n どれ。レイ:
Hahaha! I see we're all a bit high strung.
Rei, why don't you cheer up a bit and smile?

84365.「ボクは 最近 写真撮影にハマっていてね。\n とてもよい写真機を 手に入れたん:
I've recently gotten into photography. I even
got a really nice camera. Perfect for helping
my sister bring out her smile, right?

84367.「サモン叔父さまが その首に下げているのは \n 新しい コレクションのひとつで:
Is that thing around your neck from a new
collection? Don't think I've ever seen that
shape before! Which one is it?

84368.「ケイビーさま。失礼ながら……\n お食事中でございます。:
Cavy, my apologies...
But please respect those trying to eat dinner.

84370.「ふん。だが まさか ケイビーにも\n このネックレスの価値がわかるとはな。:
Hmm. Guess I didn't expect you to know the
value of this necklace.

84373.「それでも このネックレスの価値は\n アニキが地下室に隠し持っている アレの\:
Still... this necklace doesn't even come close
in value to what my brother has stashed in
the basement.

84374.「この家の 財産のすべてと言っても過言ではない\n 地下の 開かずの間に眠る秘宝:
I'm not exaggerating when I say that this family's entire wealth lies in a hidden room in the basement... a flower in a demon's gaze!
Haha.

84375.「妖魔のまなざしを 所有する者には \n 巨万の富と引き換えに 数々の不幸が\n:
Legend has it that whoever possesses the
demon's gaze will gain much wealth, but at
the cost of many misfortunes befalling them...

84376.「開かずの間になんぞ 隠しておかんでも\n 一度くらい お目にかかりたいものだよ:
I'd like to see it at least once, even if it's
tucked away in some room. Well?

84377.「いつも 大事そうに身につけている \n そのカギを使って 開かずの間を開け\n:
Why don't you use that key you oh so proudly
wear around you neck to unlock the door to
that room and show us that treasure?

84384.「あ それから…… <pc>さんの\n お部屋の用意は 済ませてありますので\n:
Oh, and.. please ask Jade if you have any
questions about the room we've prepared for
you.

84385.「<pc>さん……？ \n こんな所で いったい 何をしているのです？:
<pc>...? What on earth are you
doing here?

84386.「この先には 開かずの間と倉庫しかなく\n 館の者でも 用がない限り 近づきませ:
There's only a storage and an unoccupied
room down here. Please go back upstairs...

84392.「レイさま！！ 大丈夫ですか！？: Miss Rei! Are you all right?!

84393.「おいおい……\n 今の悲鳴は いったい 何事だい？:
Hey, hey... what the hell was all that
screaming?

84395.「あまり 大きな声は 出さないでくれ。\n なんの 騒ぎだというのだ。:
Keep your voice down. What's all this
nonsense?

84398.「だめだ…… もう死んでいる……。\n …………間違いない。\n 失踪していたは:
It's too late... he's already dead....
...but there's no doubt. This is Dezel.

84399.「な なんだって……？ デゼルが？\n そ そんな まさか……。冗談だろう……？:
W-what did you say...? Dezel? T-there's no way
that's... this is a joke, right...?

84400.「おいっ……！！\n デゼルの左手に 浮かんでいるアレを見ろっ！:
H-hey! Look at that mark on Dezel's left
hand!

84402.「はっ！ まさか！？\n こ…これは 呪いのアザなんじゃないか？: Hey, no way! Isn't this a cursed mark?

84403.「だって ここは 開かずの間の前室っ……！\n こんな所で 死んでいるなんて\n:
Because this is right in from of the Unseen
Room...! It must be the curse of the demon's
gaze that we found him dead here!

84404.「ほ…ほら！ 聞いたことあるだろう？\n 妖魔のまなざしの呪いを 受けた者には\:
L-look! The legend of the demon's gaze says
that those have been cursed by it will have
marks appear on their bodies...!

84407.「とにかく！ \n 一度 レイちゃんを部屋で休ませよう。:
Well then! I'm going to take Rei to her room
so she can rest.

84408.「私は 旦那さまに 報告してきますっ……！: I'll go report this to the Master...!

84410.「す すみません……。\n 私 気を失ってしまったみたいで……。:
I'm sorry...
I must have passed out...

84411.「<pc>さん。\n ずっと 私のそばに いてくれたんですね。\n ……ありがと:
You've been by side this whole time, haven't
you...? Thank you so much...

84414.「……ねえ <pc>さん。\n お兄さまが言うように デゼルは本当に\n 妖魔の:
...<pc>? Did Dezel really die from
the curse of the demon's gaze like my brother
said?

84415.「……私には あれが 呪いのせいだとは\n どうしても 思えないのです。:
...I'm having a very hard time believing it
was caused by that curse.

84416.「もしかしたら あの子が \n 呪いによって 死んでしまったなんて 私が\n 信:
Maybe it's just because I don't want to
believe that's how he really died...

84417.「私 弟の死の真相を知りたい。もう二度と \n デゼルに 会えないんだとしても:
I want to know the truth. Even if I never see
him again, it's too painful to say goodbye
in a situation like this...

84418.「お願いです <pc>さん。最初の依頼とは \n 少し変わってしまいましたが ど:
Please, <pc>. I know this isn't
my original request, but please prove that my
brother did not die from that curse!

84419.「皆に話を聞いて 館をすみずみまで調べれば\n わかることがあるかもしれません。:
If you talk to everyone and thoroughly search
the mansion, we might be able to find some
clues.

84420.「もし 何か わかったら\n またここへ来て 私に教えてください。\n よろしく:
If you find anything at all, please come back
here and tell me about it. Thank you...
...cough...

84421.「旦那さまは デゼルさまの件で\n とても 心を痛めておられるの。\n 用件は:
He's very distressed about what happened to
Dezel, so make it short.

84422.「旦那さまからの言葉を 伝えるわ。: I'll tell you what my Master said.

84423.「デゼルの死は 妖魔のまなざしの呪いだ。\n あまり 首を突っ込むと\n お前に:
Dezel's death was caused by the demon's gaze!
If you stick your nose where you shouldn't,
the curse will befall you too!

84424.「……以上よ。さあ さあ！ \n 旦那さまは お疲れなの。\n 用が済んだなら:
...okay, we're done. The Master is tired.
If you're finished, please get out.

84425.「<pc>さま おはようございます！\n 使用人の ジェイドです。\n 至急 お:
Good morning, <pc>! It's Jade.
I have something I must tell you!!

84426.「<pc>さまっ！ 大変です！\n 今度は ネネットさんの遺体が\n 旦那さまの:
It's terrible! This time, it was Nenette's
body that we found in the Master's room!

84427.「とにかく 一度 来ていただけませんか！？\n くわしくは そちらで お話しいた:
Anyways, let's head to the room now! I'll
tell you more once we get there.

84428.「ああ 来ましたか <pc>さん。\n 今度は 首を絞められて死んでいるようです:
There you are, <pc>. It's
horrible... she was strangled to death.

84429.「ケイビーさまが この部屋の異変に気付き \n 中をのぞいたところ 旦那さまの姿:
When Cavy noticed something strange in here
and looked inside, he found her like this with
the Master nowhere to be found.

84430.「その後 集まった数人で 旦那さまを\n 探しましたが ついに 見つけられず\n:
After that, a few of us looked for the
Master, but we couldn't find him. However,
we did find his mask near the pier.

84431.「こ これって やっぱり父さんが\n デゼルとネネットを 殺したってことなのかな:
Does this mean that Father killed Dezel and
Nenette? Why are you doing this...?

84432.「まだ そうと決まったわけじゃない。: We still don't know that for sure.

84433.「じゃあ いったい 父さんは\n どこに行ったって言うんだ！？ この状況で\n:
Then where the hell did he go?! It's really
suspicious that he's the only one gone after
everything that's happened!

84434.「ま まさか……！\n 父さんは ボクたちのこと\n 皆殺しにする気なんじゃ……:
N-no way... is Father going to kill all
of us...?!

84435.「仮面は 桟橋に投げ捨ててあったんだろ？\n アニキは ネネットを殺した後 どう:
You said you found the mask on the pier? Maybe
he killed Nenette, went into shock, and then
fell into the water?

84437.「わかりません。しかし ネネットさんの首に\n 巻きついているのは 旦那さまが身:
I don't know. But the chain around Nenette's
neck is the same one that the Master was
wearing.

84438.「ふん。もうじき 嵐も明ける。 \n そうしたら 船が出せるんだ。\n 私は こ:
Hmph. Soon this storm will be over, and then
I can use the boat. I'll be off this island
soon enough!!

84440.「……ボクも 部屋に戻る。: ...I'm going back to my room too.

84441.「……やれやれ 仕方ありませんな。 \n このままに してもおけない。ジェイドく:
Good grief... but it can't be helped. Jade,
will you help me with the body?

84443.「まさか ネネットさんまで死んでしまうなんて。\n この館で いったい 何が\n:
Even Nenette is dead... what on earth is going
on in this house...?

84444.「<pc>さんも これは父の犯行だと\n 考えているのですか？:
Do you also believe that it was my father who
caused all of this?

84445.「……そうですよね。\n この事件は まだわからないことだらけです。: ...I see. There's still a lot we don't know.

84446.「私…… お父さまが殺人を犯したなんて\n そんなこと 考えたくありません……。:
I... I don't want to think that my father is
a murderer...

84447.「お願いです <pc>さん。\n 私 どうしても この事件の真相が知りたい。\n:
Please, <pc>. I really want to
know the truth behind this. Please help me
to get to the bottom of it!

84449.「ご ごめんなさい。\n 本当に 申し訳ないのですが\n 私は 少し 休ませてい:
S-sorry... Please excuse me, but I need to
rest a little more...

84450.「もし 何か わかったら\n またここへ来て 私に教えてください。\n よろしく:
If you find anything out, come back here and
let me know. Good luck. ...cough...

84451.昨日と同様に 館内を すみずみまで調べれば\n何か わかることがあるかもしれない:
If you search the mansion as thoroughly as you did yesterday, you might be able to find something. Try to get to the bottom of what
happened.

84454.「金さ！ 金だよ！！\n 私には ギャンブルでかさんだ借金があってな。\n どう:
It was money! Money! I had debts from gambling
that I needed to pay off! I needed the money!!

84455.「私は アニキに 返済の援助を頼むために\n 屋敷を訪ねてきた。妖魔のまなざしを:
I came here to ask my brother in help with repaying the loan. He wanted me to forget about the demon's gaze and prepare a large
sum of money for me.

84456.「ところが アニキは 私と会おうとしなかった。\n それも そうさ。だって この:
However, he didn't want to see me. That's
because... Dezel was already pretending to
be him.

84457.「私は アニキと話をするために手紙を書いた。\n 妖魔のまなざしの件で 話がした:
I wrote to my brother so I could talk to him.
I said I wanted to talk about the demon's
gaze.

84458.「昨日 <pc>さんが\n デゼルの遺体から 発見した手紙は\n 叔父さまが 書:
The letter that <pc> found on
Dezel's body yesterday was written by you?

84459.「ああ そうさ！ すると どうしたものか。 \n それまで かたくなに 私と会お:
That's right! I wondered what happened. He
stubbornly refused to see me, and then he
suddenly agreed to it?

84460.「なあ アニキ。頼むよ……！\n いいだろ？ ちょっとくらい貸してくれたって。\:
Hey, brother, please..! How about it? Please
help me just a little. Your own blood brother
is asking for your help here!

84462.「……ク クソッ！\n おい。話は 最後まで聞け！\n 今まで さんざん 無視し:
...D-damn it! Hey, listen to me! You've been
ignoring me this whole time!!

84463.「つい カッとなった私の目の前に\n 倒れていたのは…… アニキではなく\n 血:
I lost my temper, and what I found lying in
front of me wasn't my brother... it was Dezel,
covered in blood.

84464.「とっさに 妖魔のまなざしの呪いに\n 見立てることを思いついた私は 工作をした:
I had the sudden idea to make it look like
it was the curse from the demon's gaze, but...
That's when SHE showed up...!

84465.「デゼルの帰りが遅いと思って 様子を見にきたら \n まさか こんなことになって:
I thought Dezel came home late, so I came to
check up on him. But I sure wasn't expecting
this.

84466.「なっ！ 貴様は……ネネット！？\n ど どうして ここにっ！？:
Wha-! You're... Nenette?! W-what are YOU
doing here?!

84467.「旦那さまに なりすましているデゼルに\n 協力者がいるとは 考えなかった？\n:
I guess it never occurred to you that Dezel,
while impersonating the Master, may have an
accomplice? That's right. We're accomplices.

84468.「デゼルと一緒に 開かずの間の秘密を\n 探っていたの。もちろん 妖魔のまなざし:
Dezel and I were trying to figure out the
secret of the Unseen Room. And, of course, use
the demon's gaze to take over this property.

84469.「デゼルったら アタシの魅力に\n 首ったけ だったみたいでぇ～。\n アタシの:
Dezel was so obsessed with me, he couldn't
say no. He listened to just eeeverything I
said. <heart>

84470.「デゼルを言いくるめて 旦那さまから\n 開かずの間のカギを盗もうとしたところま:
It was fine up until the part where I
convinced him to steal the key from the
Master...

84471.「バカなデゼルが 旦那さまを殺しちゃってさ。 \n 入れ替わって カギを手に入れ:
That idiot Dezel killed the Master. So he
switched places with him and got the key. But
he couldn't find the keyhole.

84472.「そこに 妖魔のまなざしの件でって\n 手紙を送ってきたのが アナタってわけ。\:
And it was you who send that letter about the
demon's gaze, right? Hey, Samon... why don't
we work together?

84473.「ネネットと組んだおかげで 私は\n アニキに なりすますことができた。\n だ:
I was able to disguise as my brother thanks
to Nenette's cooperation. However, that girl
is...

84474.「組まないか？ とクチでは 言っておきながら\n 実際には 私をゆすってきやがっ:
"You want to work together?" she said. But all
she wanted was just to swindle me!! So...!!

84475.「あとは…… そこの名探偵さんが\n 推理した通りさ……。:
And the rest is just like our detective here
deduced...

84476.「ぜんぶ アニキの仕業だったことにして\n 妖魔のまなざしを盗み 島からトンズラ:
I thought if I just pretended it was all my
brother's doing, steal the demon's gaze, and
leave the island, everything would be fine...

84477.「結局 開かずの間のカギ穴は 見つからないわ\n こんな名探偵が 現れるわで\n:
We couldn't find the keyhole, and then this
detective shows up... luck was not on my
side.

84478.「……サモンさまは 後日 ヴェリナード王国へ \n 引き渡し しかるべき処罰が\:
Samon. I shall arrange to have you taken to
Verinard where you will be punished
accordingly for your crimes.

84479.「……いつの間にか\n 長い 長い 嵐が明けたようですね。:
...it seems that the long storm has finally
ended.

84481.「雨空にも いつか必ず 陽の光が差すように……\n 叔父さまの心も あたたかな光:
I hope that one day the sun will shine through the rainy sky... I hope my uncle's heart will be covered in a warm light too, and he will
truly realize the error of his ways...

84568.「私からは 以上になります。\n それでは どうぞ ごゆるりと。: And that's all. Now, if you'll excuse me.

84571.「<pc>さま おはようございます。\n 使用人の ジェイドです。\n お伝えし:
Good morning, <pc>. It's Jade.
I would like to tell you something.

84572.「おはようございます。\n 昨晩は よくお休みになられたようですね。: Good morning. I hope you slept well.

84573.「じつは 数十年ぶりの大嵐で \n とても 船を出せる状況ではなく\n レイさま:
This is the biggest storm we've had in years,
I'm afraid. It's too dangerous to launch our
boat, and I have a message from Miss Rei.

84574.「どうか 嵐が過ぎるまで 館内でごゆっくり\n おくつろぎください とのことでし:
Please make yourself at home until the storm
clears.

84575.「以上になります。\n それでは お伝えしましたので\n 私は 失礼いたします。: And that's all. If you'll excuse me.

84576.「それから <pc>さま。 \n くり返しになり 申し訳ありませんが……:
Ah, right. Apologies that I must tell you
again, but...

84577.「どうか 地下室と 旦那さまのお部屋にだけは \n お近づきになりませんよう:
Please stay away from the basement and the
Master's room.

84584.「……<pc>さん？\n ここは もしかして開かずの間の中！？:
...<pc>? Could this be the
inside of the Unseen Room?!

84585.「まさか 開かずの間への本当の入り口が\n 父の部屋から つながっていたなんて！:
I had no idea that the real entrance was in my
father's room this whole time! No wonder I
couldn't find the keyhole.

84590.だが この研究は あまりに危険すぎる。\n妖魔のまなざしの呪いの伝承は 実験中の:
However, this research is too dangerous. The lore regarding the demon gaze's curse is said to spell disaster, due to the number of
accidents that occurred when experimenting it.

84591.薬の精製には 長い年月が必要になるが\nレイの ２０歳の誕生日までには\n完成さ:
It will take many years to refine it. But, it
should be ready by Rei's 20th birthday.

84592.そして その時には 子供たち３人を\nこの手で おもいきり 抱きしめてやりたい。:
And when that happens, I'd like to hold all
three of my children so tightly in my arms.
...that is the only thing I want.

84597.「事件だけじゃなく 開かずの間の謎まで \n 解き明かしてしまうなんて\n <p:
Not only did you solve the incident, but you
also solved the mystery of the Unseen Room.
You truly are a detective, <pc>.

84598.「本当に ありがとうございました。\n ささやかですが これは 私からのお礼です:
Thank you so much. This is just a little
something from me. Please accept it.

84599.「……引き止めてしまってすみません。\n 帰りの船を 手配いたしますね。\n 私:
...I'm sorry to keep you. I'll arrange to have
a boat return you home. I'll never forget
about you, <pc>.

84608.「……失礼ながら どうも これ以上\n 話を聞いても ムダなように思われます。:
...pardon me for saying so, but it seems
there's no point in asking any more questions.

84609.「皆さまも もう <pc>さまの話を \n 聞く気はない ご様子。\n この場は:
It seems that everyone is no longer interested
in what <pc> has to say.
I'm going to have to ask you to leave.

84612.こうして 真相が 明かされることのないまま\n事件は 幕を閉じた。:
And so, the case closed without the truth
ever being revealed.

84613.翌日には 嵐が明け\n<pc>は 紅玉館を後にするのだった。:
The next day, the storm cleared and
<pc> left the Ruby Mansion.

84618.<pc>は ノートの文字を読んでみた。:
<pc> read the words in the
notebook.

84619.「これは 父の研究日誌……？\n 父は ここで なんの研究を\n していたのでし:
Is this my father's research journal...? What
was he working on down here?

84620.ケイビー…… レイ…… デゼル……。\n母さんを 救えなかった私を どうか許して:
Cavy, Rei, Dezel... Please forgive me for
failing to save your mother.

84621.治療薬の研究は 間に合わなかった。\n……しかし 私はついに 妖魔のまなざしこそ:
The research for a cure will not be completed
in time. But I finally discovered that the
demon's gaze is the source of the cure.

84622.それでも 母親……メアリーと 同じ運命を\nレイに たどらせるわけにはいかない。:
Still, your mother... I can't let Rei suffer
the same fate as Mary did. I'll do everything
in my power to save her.

84623.この研究室の 錬金釜から精製した薬を飲めば\n必ずや レイの命を助けることができ:
I believe that the potion purified from the
alchemy pot in this laboratory will
surely save Rei's life.

84624.「そ…そんな……まさか お父さまが ずっと\n 私の病気を 治療する方法を \n:
N..no way... my father has been looking for a
way to cure my illness.

84625.「……私は 母と同じ病気を わずらっていて\n 長くは 生きられないだろうと\n:
...I have the same disease my mother had,
and I've been told since I was little that
I wouldn't live long.

84626.「これが お父さまが残してくれた薬なんですね。\n 心なしか 優しさに満ちあふれ:
This is the medicine Father left me, isn't it?
There's something kind and gentle about it...
It's full of tenderness.

84627.「ああ 苦しみが やわらいでいく……。\n お父さま。かけがえのない誕生日プレゼ:
Ah, I feel the pain easing already...
Father, thank you so much for this priceless
birthday gift...

84628.「できることなら 直接 ありがとうと\n お伝えしたかった……。もう一度 あの手:
I wish I could've thanked you in person...
I wanted you to hold me in your arms one
last time...

84629.「私 事件が起きてから 泣くことだけはすまいと\n ずっと 耐えていたんです。泣:
Since the incident happened, I've been trying
not to cry. I felt that if I cried, my heart
would break...

84630.「でも 今のこの涙は そんな私のヒビ割れた心を\n いやしてくれました。父の治療:
But these tears heal my cracked heart, just as
my father's cure healed my body...

84631.「悲しみが消えることは ないけれど。 \n それでも 私は 父が救ってくれたこの:
The sadness will never go away. But I will
cherish this life that my father saved, and
live my life to the fullest.

84882.「コレは 知り合いの古物商から買い取ったのだ。\n ヴェリナード領の海に眠る 沈:
I bought it from an antiques seller that I
know. It came from a sunken ship somewhere
in the sea near Verinard.

84883.「ほう。ヴェリナード領の沈没船ですか。\n それは ロマンがある話ですね。:
Hmm. A Verinard shipwreck? What a romantic
story.

84884.「チッ いつもいつも コレだ。話しかけても\n すぐに リンゴの皮をむきはじめる:
Tch, of course! Every time I start talking to
him, he just starts peeling away at an apple!
When did you become such a freak?!

84885.「叔父さま……。\n お客さまの前です……。\n そのくらいにしておいて……:
Uncle... we have a guest here...
That's enough...

84888.「申し訳ありませんが 私も\n あまり 調子がよくないので\n そろそろ休ませて:
I'm sorry, but I'm not feeling too well
myself, so I'm going to go rest... *cough*...

84889.「そうだね。無理はしない方がいい。\n では 私たちも そろそろ戻るとしようか。:
I agree. You shouldn't push yourself. Well,
we'd best head back to our rooms.

84890.「明日からは 弟の捜索の件 くれぐれも\n よろしくお願いしますね。\n それで:
Starting tomorrow, please help in searching
for my brother. Now, if you'll excuse me.
Cough, cough...

90944.「ほら。この ネックレスの 宝石部分を外して\n 台座だけにした後……:
Look. After removing the jewel and just
leaving the base...

90945.「開かずの間の前室にあった\n ロウソクを使って 火であぶって……:
It was in front of the Unseen Room, you used
a candle to heat it up...

90946.「こうやって 一度押し当てます。: Press it down once like this.

90947.「今度は ネックレスを さっきとは逆向きにして\n もう一度押し当てると……。\:
Then if you turn the necklace the other way
and press down, it will look just like the
mark on Dezel's hand!

90948.「おおお！ 本当だ！\n ……よく こんなことに気がつきましたね。\n <pc>:
Oooh! It's true! How did you even notice
that, <pc>?!

90949.「もう 言いのがれは できませんわ。\n 叔父さま…… どうか罪を認めてください:
You can't make any more excuses. Uncle...
Please confess for your crimes...

91847.「ただ ご当主さまは ちょっと変わってるッス！\n ひと目見たら きっと アンタ:
However, the owner is a little strange! You
might be surprised when you finally see it for
yourself.

91848.「それだけじゃないッス。\n じつは お屋敷には…………: And that's not all. Truth is, that house...

91849.「２階北西に位置する 旦那さまのお部屋だけは\n お近づきになりませんよう ご注:
Please be careful not to approach the
Master's room, which is located on the
northwest side of the second floor.

91850.「このような格好で 申し訳ありませんが\n どうぞ ごゆっくり 食事をお楽しみく:
My apologies for dressing like this, but
please, relax yourselves and enjoy your meal.

91851.「宝石だけでも それなりのものだが \n 取り外すこともできる このシズク型の台:
The gems alone are with a fortune. However,
it's the droplet-shaped base that can be
removed that also makes it valuable.

91852.「私も つい 懐かしくなって……\n 絵本を読もうと 父の部屋に来たら \n 本:
I was feeling nostalgic... I went to my
father's room to read that picture book, and
then noticed the door behind the bookshelf.

91853.この研究の成果を すべて 最愛の娘レイに捧ぐ。:
I dedicate the fruits of this research to my
daughter, Rei.

93426.「……書斎は あまり使われないので\n 普段は 閉じてあるのですが\n 開放させ:
...the Study is usually locked up since it's
not used often, but I've arranged to have it
unlocked for you.

93427.「私も 部屋へ戻ります……。\n お話ししたいことがあるので\n <pc>さんも:
I'll also go back to my room... please come
with me, <pc>. There's something
I'd like to discuss with you.

93428.「財を成し 幸せな家庭も持った 優秀なアニキ。\n そんなアイツに無視されると:
My brother was a brilliant man with a happy family. When he ignored me, I felt like my existence didn't matter to him. I couldn't
forgive that...

93429.危険を伴う この研究は秘密で行なうべきだ。\n私自身にとっても 孤独な戦いとなる:
This research is risky and will be conducted
in secret. It will be a lonely struggle,
but... one day my family will understand.
